Name: Hungry Caveman
About the game: Cenozoic Jump Action Adventure with Hungry Caveman! Features Simple but sophisticated hunting system Keep in mind that Caveman's perfect hunt for survival is two things: speed and angle. Weapons with various effects There are three kinds of weapons that have special abilities to help Caveman hunt. Use special weapons to hunt! Passive ability with various effects With your help, Caveman can get the skills he needs to hunt. Caveman can not only remember the previous speed and the previous angle, but also detect the location of the prey! More than 10 species of animals that hunt in five areas You can hunt various animals in various areas. Feel the scene of the Cenozoic era.
